name: laravel/framework

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver and SES mail driver (~2.4).
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (~2.4).
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the Mailgun and Mandrill mail drivers (~5.0).
suggest.iron-io/iron_mq: Required to use the iron queue driver (~1.5).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v2: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-rackspace: Required to use the Flysystem Rackspace driver (~1.0).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (~3.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the redis cache and queue drivers (~1.0).

description: The Laravel Framework.
